name: Solitaire Christmas. Match 2 Cards
description: Solitaire Christmas. Match 2 Cards in a fun solitaire. 120 unique levels! Ho-ho-ho Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsÂ® 7 32/64 bit Processor: Intel Atom N455 (1660 MHz) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Intel GMA 3150 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 56 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Solitaire Christmas. Match 2 Cards is a game that I recommend because: - it is a method to banish boredom - it has a good price - is casual - it is addictive - it has strategy - it is difficult - it has trading cards  Enjoy!
This match-two-cards kind of solitaire is new to me but I'm enjoying it. I like the music too.
